entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Castlegar
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:26 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain and Snow, 1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Castlegar Airport 1:26 PM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain and Snow
Temperature: 1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 1.1°C
Wind: SE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1
